sentences.sContent: Regular outings contribute to a sense of fellowship among co-workers.
sentences.sCn: 经常外出游玩可以增进同事之间的友谊。

synos.tran: 友谊；奖学金；研究员职位

phrases.pCn: 交际广，好交际；讨人喜欢
出国奖学金；旅行奖学金

remMethod.val: fellow(伙伴) ＋ ship(关系) → 伙伴关系 → 友谊

words.tran: 使…与另一个对等；使…与另一个匹敌

trans.tranOther: a feeling of friendship between people who do things together or share an interest
